title: Implement task list pane (left)
description:
Implement renderTaskPane() function:

Layout:
- Fixed width: 35 characters
- Rounded border (gray when unfocused, blue when focused)
- Header: 'Tasks' or 'Tasks (3/8)'
- Scrollable list of tasks

Task line format:
'▶ ● [id] Task title here...'
- Selection cursor: ▶ if selected, space otherwise
- Status icon: ○/●/✓/⊘ with appropriate color
- ID in brackets
- Title truncated with ... if too long

Visual states:
- Selected task: blue bold
- Unselected: dim lavender
- Current executing: pulsing indicator
- Blocked: red icon with 'blocked by: [ids]' below

Navigation:
- j/k moves selection when pane focused
- Selection wraps or clamps at bounds
- Highlight changes trigger detail update

Use ansi.Truncate() for title truncation to preserve ANSI codes.
closed_reason: Implemented renderTaskPane with header showing completed/total count, task lines with selection cursor (▶), status icons with pulsing for current task, blocked by indicators, j/k navigation, and ansi.Truncate for title truncation. Added renderTaskLine helper. Updated Update() with task list navigation (j/k/g/G/pgup/pgdown), help toggle (?), and pane switching (tab).
